Please take a moment to remember those who are spending today away from their loved ones, protecting our country. Sometimes it’s difficult to acknowledge what we have to be thankful for, but it’s easy to appreciate the sacrifice of those who serve our nation. Happy Thanksgiving.

Outside Washington, #NetNeutrality is not a partisan issue. Americans across the political spectrum overwhelmingly support a free and open internet. There is no excuse to continue to delay a vote. We must pass the CRA and restore these critical protections.

On Veterans Day, we honor the men and women in uniform who have served our nation. Today especially, we remember the price paid in WWI - the “War to End all Wars” - which ended 100 years ago. We must continue to give back to all our veterans and their families.

My thoughts go out to the people of Thousand Oaks, and to the families of those we lost in this senseless tragedy. The American people have long called for commonsense reforms to address the gun violence epidemic in our country, and it's time for Congress to answer that call.
